t: How CPG Companies Win with Amazon
s: October 13, 2021 - Amazon is a lot less concerned with whether a product or brand is a category leader so long as it is a sales leader on Amazon.com or on one of the company’s other sites or apps. Moreover, Amazon is not particularly worried about its margins for any individual item.
